game.name: DC's Justice League: Cosmic Chaos
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 배트맨, 원더우먼, 슈퍼맨이 되어 DC 저스티스 리그와 함께 DC’s Justice League : 우주 대혼란의 DC 유니버스에서 가장 강력한 슈퍼 빌런을 상대하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Suit up as Batman, Wonder Woman and Superman and take on some of the most powerful Super-Villains in the DC universe with DC’s Justice League: Cosmic Chaos.

reviewHighlights.text: Its a fun version of Justice League. Unfortunately we dont have many Justice league or Superman games and this one though looks like a Lego game, I en...
